DOC.brief_summary: Assessment of sedative effects of dexmedetomidine and propofol on the clinical course of delirium and neuroinflammation in patients with SIRS using CAM-ICU scale and protein S100b in serum.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Dexmedetomidine and Propofol on the Delirium and Neuroinflammation in Patients With SIRS.
DOC.criteria: presence of delirium presence of Alzheimer's disease any mental disorder presence of cancer
